name: Kilrah
startIntroPart1: Welcome to the throne, Emperor Thrakhath nar Kiranka. The clans stand ready to follow you.
startIntroPart2: May the blood of our enemies run freely and may they flee before the might of Kilrah.
declaringWar: We will feast upon your entrails
attacked: You dare attack us? We will devour you
defeated: How is it that you defy us? We... surrender
introduction: Greetings from the honourable empire of Kilrah.
neutralNo: You are not worthy of this.
hateHello: You dare make requests of us?
hateNo: We will eat your heart and spit it out!
You have no right to speak.
hateYes: We will take these terms, and crush you later.
This will be your last mistake.
afterPeace: You no longer deserve our notice. We will cease hostilities for now.
tradeRequest: Give us what we want, or we will take it from your corpse later.
